text: The Watchman Catholic Charismatic Renewal Movement is a Nigerian Christian megachurch founded by Pastor Aloysius Chukwuemeka Ohanebo. The church is headquartered in Lagos, Nigeria and has branches all over Nigeria. == Annual events == * Mount Horeb Retreat * Easter Retreat * Hill Top Encounter * Youth Week * International Gospel Minister's Conference (IGMC) * Internal Ministers Conference (January Pastors Meeting ) == References == == External links == * Category:Churches in Lagos Category:Evangelical megachurches in Nigeria Category:Charismatic denominations
title: Watchman Catholic Charismatic Renewal Movement
